Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays from the area of O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays from the area of O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: Green Line trains continue stand in the area of Austin due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains continue stand in the area of Austin due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
